body.p: Spencer County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of John Henry, Sr. and Amy Reed Henry. Married Eliza Henry. Father of John A. Henry, Anna M. Henry, Martha A. Henry, William P. Henry, Minor J. Henry, Ezekiel M. Henry, James T. Henry, and Allen B. Henry. Farmer in Spencer County in 1850. Owned three enslaved people in Spencer County in 1860. Member of the Baptist Church.
